title: China Nods to Russia’s Interests in Attack on Ukraine
sub_head: Beijing says it continues to respect sovereignty but points to ‘complicated and specific’ questions between Kyiv and Moscow
body:
TAIPEI—China expressed support for Russia’s interests in Ukraine and stopped short of calling the all-out offensive an invasion as it blamed Washington for fueling tensions with Moscow.
In a call with Russian Foreign Minister Sergei Lavrov on Thursday, China Foreign Minister Wang Yi repeated China’s position that it respects the sovereignty and territorial integrity of all nations, but added that Beijing could see “complicated and specific” historical questions at play in Ukraine, according to a readout published by state media in the Beijing evening.
